src:
如果巨大的小行星撞擊地球會怎樣（視頻）

07 Nov 2019, 03:17

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】如果隕石墜入海洋，會發生海嘯嗎？
時間戳:隕石多久撞擊地球一次1:30什麼樣的隕石會造成破壞 1:56或者威脅地球文明2:17隕石撞擊地球會怎樣3:03如果擊中的是海洋會發生什麼呢? 5:30海嘯的物理原理6:25艾爾塔寧撞擊8:20

text:
What if a huge asteroid hits the Earth (video)

07 Nov 2019, 03:17

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] If the meteorite falls into the ocean, will there be a tsunami?
Timestamp: How long does the meteorite hit the earth at 1:30? What kind of meteorite will cause damage 1:56 or threaten the earth civilization 2:17 What will happen to the earth when the meteorite hits the earth 3:03 What happens if the sea is hit? 5:30 The physical principle of the tsunami 6:25 Al Tanin impact 8:20
